title: The Thinking Fan's Guide to Walt Disney World: Magic Kingdom
description: A different kind of guidebook, this leaves out the usual ephemera ontrip planning, ticket prices, restaurants, and shopping to concentrate onwhat visitors to Magic Kingdom come to see - the rides and attractions. Wallacecovers the history and lore of each one and offers a light-heartedbut serious discussion of each attraction as a work of narrative fiction. Headds coverage of attractions that have opened since 2013 in this new edition.
author: Aaron Wallace
